con:testStep.name: Copy of Groovy Script – Data Loop

con:config.script:
import javax.naming.Context
def myTestCase = context.testCase
def propTestStep = myTestCase.getTestStepByName("Property – Looper") // get the Property TestStep propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Total", "") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Value", "") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Count", "0") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Next", "0") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Stoploop", "F") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("rowCount", "1") propTestStep.setPropertyValue("Epics", "")

con:property.con:name: Epics
